page.title: 19Sport in Fordingbridge.
page.content: The history of{Fordingbridge {Football Club (The Turks)}goes back to 1868. It is Hampshire's oldest team. Today the team competes in the Bournemouth Football League. {Fordingbridge Cricket Club celebrated its centenary in 1983. It has gained considerably in strength since 1979 when League Cricket came to the town. The four senior teams and two colt teams now compete in several local leagues. 15 years ago,{Badminton}was started at the Town Hall. The club plays in the Poole League. Burgate School Badminton Club started two years ago when the sports hall was finished. This team plays in the Salisbury League. Since the completion of the new sports hall, a large number of people have been able to enjoy a wide range of{indoor sporting activities.
